short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension for Pivotal Tracker that addresses color issues in the app for colorblind users.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A chrome extension for colorblind users of Pivotal Tracker (www.pivotaltracker.com)

Features:
- Underlining of epic labels
- Patterned story backgrounds
